Name: VR Plane Crash
About the game: We will all be curious about some experiences. But we also hope that everyone will not encounter such experiences. For example, what does a plane crash look like? This game will let curious you have some VR experiences. Hope there will be no more plane crashes in the real world. In the game, you will simulate the flight of an airplane and you can control the airplane. After flying for a period of time, the airplane will crash due to a malfunction, and you will also fall to a small island full of zombies due to the crash. In order to survive you need to cut down the zombies and find the treasures on the island.
